member.name: T:SimpleWebBrowser.Tab
member.summary: This class is used to define a Tab of our web browser. So we can use it like a unique entity composed of many various controls
member.remarks: This class derives from TabPage which defines an empry Tab. We want the same behaviour for our custom Tab

member.name: F:SimpleWebBrowser.Tab.obj
member.summary: This property is used to have a reference of Main (initially Form1) So we can perform actions on it and call methods
member.remarks: This makes the Designer crash beacause Main instancies some Tab objetcs which references themselves Main But so far it compiles and works

member.name: P:SimpleWebBrowser.Tab.goPreviousBtn
member.summary: This button is used to go to the previous URL
member.remarks: The accessibility level is protected internal so we can access the button within the assembly and perform actions on it Also internal, in case we need a derived type of this class

member.name: P:SimpleWebBrowser.Tab.goNextBtn
member.summary: This button is used to go to the next URL we can visit
member.remarks: The accessibility level is protected internal so we can access the button within the assembly and perform actions on it Also internal, in case we need a derived type of this class

member.name: P:SimpleWebBrowser.Tab.reloadBtn
member.summary: This button is used to perform a GET request at the specified URL
member.remarks: The accessibility level is protected internal so we can access the button within the assembly and perform actions on it Also internal, in case we need a derived type of this class

member.name: P:SimpleWebBrowser.Tab.urlEntry
member.summary: This textox is used to enter a URL
member.remarks: The accessibility level is protected internal so we can access the button within the assembly and perform actions on it Also internal, in case we need a derived type of this class

member.name: P:SimpleWebBrowser.Tab.htmlDisplay
member.summary: This button is used to display the HTML we received from the GET request
member.remarks: The accessibility level is protected internal so we can access the button within the assembly and perform actions on it Also internal, in case we need a derived type of this class

member.name: P:SimpleWebBrowser.Tab.localHistory
member.summary:
This list is used to have logs of the pages visited with the current tab
It is useful for the Previous and Next buttons

member.name: F:SimpleWebBrowser.Main.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:SimpleWebBrowser.Main.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SimpleWebBrowser.Main.InitializeComponent

member.name: M:SimpleWebBrowser.Program.Main
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:SimpleWebBrowser.Request
member.summary: We don't need to instantiate this class as all its methods are defined with static

member.name: M:SimpleWebBrowser.Request.getRequest(System.String,SimpleWebBrowser.Tab)
member.summary:
Sends a GET request to a website The url of the targeted website The tab 'from which' we send the request
This method is marked with async Task to have an asynchronous method GetResponseAsync() this way the UI isn't blocked by the GET and its callback

member.name: M:SimpleWebBrowser.Request.CreateRequest(SimpleWebBrowser.HistoryEntity.History,SimpleWebBrowser.Tab)
member.summary:
Sends a GET request to a website The global history of the browser The tab 'from which' we send the request
This method is marked with async to have an asynchronous method getRequest() The purpose of the function is to add the url to the history and make sure we have a valid URI

member.name: M:SimpleWebBrowser.Request.formatUrl(System.String)
member.summary:
Formats a string into a proper url A string that may not be a correct url
We just add the missing parts of a correct url scheme.

member.summary: Retourne l'instance ResourceManager mise en cache utilisée par cette classe.

member.name: P:SimpleWebBrowser.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Remplace la propriété CurrentUICulture du thread actuel pour toutes les recherches de ressources à l'aide de cette classe de ressource fortement typée.
